title: Homemade focaccia bread stuffed with ricotta and spinach
ingredients: ['For the focaccia dough', '1 1/2 teaspoon dried active yeast', '3 tablespoons water', '2 teaspoons sugar', '400g bread flour', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '200ml warm water or as needed', '2 teaspoons salt', 'Filling', '300g fresh spinach', '300g ricotta cheese', '2 slices fresh mozzarella cheese, cubed', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '3 tablespoons tomato passata (optional)', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil mixed with 2 tablespoons water for brushing']
